value:
I've never killed before—never even
seen a battlefield before now... But
I aim to do all that is in my power.

I am told my father was Ashnard,
who was known as the Mad King.
It still doesn't feel real to me...$k$pIt's a little overwhelming, to be frank.

Micaiah and Sothe are in this world as
well, aren't they? I am glad to have an
opportunity to fight alongside them.

If I am ever able to rebuild Daein,
I hope to put all that I have learned
here to good use.

Even if my fate threatens to
overpower my desires, I will
not give up. I will persevere.

I am Pelleas, prince of Daein. This is
a token of friendship, entrusted to me
by $Nf.

That was rather effective. Not half
bad, coming from me.

I must be satisfied with slow growth
if that is the best I can manage.

If things continue at this rate, I would
be better off never showing my face
in Daein again...

Thank you. I am grateful, truly.
I will use this new power to stoke
the fire inside me.

My name is Pelleas. I am the prince
of Daein. But you need not be formal
with me—I was raised a commoner.

Hypothetically...if you were caught
up in events beyond your control,
what would you do?$k$pI sense a strong will behind your
eyes. I think you would overcome
any obstacle, no matter what it was.$k$pUnlike my father, who was known
for his dauntlessness, I have no
love for combat.$k$pBut when the people I should
protect are forced to live under
the weight of domination...$k$pI cannot simply stand by and allow
such things to happen.$k$pThe time will come when I must
make a decision, a decision that
will require courage from me.$k$pIt may even mean I am forced into
a battle I would just as soon avoid...$k$pBut to have the courage to move
forward, to never give in...even in
the face of unspeakable odds...$k$pI have been learning all this and more
during my time here with the Order,
and I do not plan to stop now.
はあっ
いくよ
くうっ…
This ain't good...
For Daein.
I must take action!
I cannot look away!
Let me through.
I fear...nothing.
Chuckle...
I am Pelleas. I may be a prince of Daein, but I was raised as a normal commoner.
*laugh* Making mischief, are you? I've not done that since I was a child.

It still doesn't feel real to me...that I
could be the son of King Ashnard.

I count my blessings to have Micaiah
as vice-general. She gives me hope.

I cannot ignore the tragedies of this world.
No man can, and certainly no prince.

Micaiah and Sothe are so close it's almost like
they're siblings. As an only child, I envy them.

I don't fight for you out of princely duty. I do it
because I want to—because it makes me happy.
Guide me.
Are you sure?
I will do as you ask.
